signs seasons days years 115 let lights firmament heaven give light upon earth 116 god made two great lights greater light rule day lesser light rule night made stars also 117 god set firmament heaven give light upon earth 118 rule day night divide light darkness god saw good 119 evening morning fourth day 120 god said let waters bring forth abundantly moving creature hath life fowl may fly earth open firmament heaven 121 god created great whales every living creature moveth waters brought forth abundantly kind every winged fowl kind god saw good 122 god blessed saying fruitful multiply fill waters seas let fowl multiply earth 123 evening morning fifth day 124 god said let earth bring forth living creature kind cattle creeping thing beast earth kind 125 god made beast earth kind cattle kind every thing creepeth upon earth kind god saw good 126 god said let us make man image likeness let dominion fish sea fowl air cattle earth every creeping thing creepeth upon earth 127 god created man image image god created male female created 128 god blessed god said unto fruitful multiply replenish earth subdue dominion fish sea fowl air every living thing moveth upon earth 129 god said behold given every herb bearing seed upon face earth every tree fruit tree yielding seed shall meat 130 every beast earth every fowl air every thing creepeth upon earth wherein life given every green herb meat 131 god saw every thing made behold good evening morning sixth day 21 thus heavens earth finished host 22 seventh day god ended work made rested seventh day work made 23 god blessed seventh till ground 26 went mist earth watered whole face ground 27 lord god formed man dust ground breathed nostrils breath life man became living soul 28 lord god planted garden eastward eden put man formed eatest thereof thou shalt surely die 218 lord god said good man alone make help meet 219 ground lord god formed every beast field every fowl air brought unto adam see would call whatsoever adam called thereof 222 rib lord god taken man made woman brought unto man 223 adam said bone bones flesh flesh shall called woman taken man 224 therefore shall man leave father mother shall cleave unto wife shall one flesh 225 naked man wife ashamed 31 serpent subtil beast field lord god made said unto woman yea hath god said ye shall eat every tree garden 32 woman said unto serpent may eat fruit trees garden 33 fruit tree midst garden god hath said ye shall eat neither shall ye touch lest ye die 34 serpent said unto woman ye shall surely die 35 god doth know day ye eat thereof eyes shall opened ye shall gods knowing good evil 36 woman saw tree good food pleasant eyes tree desired make one wise took fruit thereof eat gave also unto husband eat 37 eyes opened knew naked sewed fig leaves together made aprons 38 heard voice lord god walking garden cool day adam wife hid presence lord god amongst trees garden 39 lord god called unto adam said unto art thou 310 said heard thy voice garden afraid naked hid 311 said told thee thou wast naked hast thou eaten tree whereof commanded thee thou shouldest eat 312 man said woman thou gavest gave tree eat 313 lord god said unto woman thou hast done woman said serpent beguiled eat 314 lord god said unto serpent thou hast done thou art cursed cattle every beast field upon thy belly shalt thou go dust shalt thou eat days thy life 315 put enmity thee woman thy seed seed shall bruise thy head thou shalt bruise heel 316 unto woman said greatly multiply thy sorrow thy conception sorrow thou shalt bring forth children thy desire shall thy husband shall rule thee 317 unto adam said thou hast hearkened unto voice thy wife hast eaten tree commanded thee saying thou shalt eat cursed ground thy sake sorrow shalt thou eat days thy life 318 thorns also thistles shall bring forth thee thou shalt eat herb field 319 sweat thy face shalt thou eat bread till thou return unto ground wast thou taken dust thou art unto dust shalt thou return 320 adam called wifes name eve mother living 321 unto adam also wife lord god make coats skins clothed 322 lord god said behold man become one us know good evil lest put forth hand take also tree life eat live also 1813 lord said unto abraham wherefore sarah laugh saying shall surety bear child old 1814 thing hard lord time appointed return unto thee according time life sarah shall son 1815 sarah denied saying laughed afraid said nay thou didst laugh 1816 men rose thence looked toward sodom abraham went bring way 1817 lord said shall hide abraham thing 1818 seeing abraham shall surely become great grievous 1821 go see whether done altogether according cry come unto know 1822 men turned faces thence went toward sodom abraham stood yet lord 1823 abraham drew near said wilt thou also destroy righteous wicked 1824 peradventure fifty righteous within city wilt thou also destroy spare place fifty righteous therein 1825 far thee manner slay righteous wicked righteous wicked far thee shall judge earth right 1826 lord said find sodom fifty righteous within city spare place sakes 1827 abraham answered said behold taken upon speak unto lord dust ashes 1828 peradventure shall lack five one fellow came sojourn needs judge deal worse thee pressed sore upon man even lot came near break door 1910 men put forth hand pulled lot house shut door 1911 smote men door house blindness small great wearied find door 1912 men said unto lot hast thou besides son law thy sons thy daughters whatsoever thou hast city bring place 1913 destroy place cry waxen great face lord lord hath sent us destroy 1914 lot went spake unto sons law married daughters said get place lord destroy city seemed one mocked unto sons law 1915 morning arose angels hastened lot saying arise take thy wife thy two daughters lest thou consumed iniquity city 1916 lingered men laid hold upon hand upon hand wife upon hand two daughters lord merciful unto brought forth set without city 1917 came pass brought forth abroad said escape thy life look behind thee neither stay thou plain escape mountain lest thou consumed 1918 lot said unto oh lord 1919 behold thy servant hath found grace thy sight thou hast magnified thy mercy thou hast shewed unto saving life escape mountain lest evil take die 1920 behold city near flee unto little one oh let escape thither little one soul shall live 1921 said unto see captain lords host said unto joshua loose thy shoe thy foot place whereon thou standest holy joshua 61 jericho straitly shut children israel none went none came 62 lord said unto joshua see given thine hand jericho king thereof mighty men valour 63 ye shall compass city ye men war go round city thus shalt thou six days 64 seven priests shall bear ark seven trumpets rams horns seventh day ye shall compass city seven times priests shall blow trumpets 65 shall come pass make long blast rams horn ye hear sound trumpet people shall shout great shout wall city shall fall flat people shall ascend every man straight 66 joshua son nun called priests said unto take ark covenant let seven priests bear seven trumpets rams horns ark lord 67 said unto people pass compass city let armed pass ark lord 68 came pass joshua spoken unto people seven priests bearing seven trumpets rams horns passed lord blew trumpets ark covenant lord followed 69 armed men went priests blew trumpets rereward came ark priests going blowing trumpets 610 joshua commanded people saying ye shall shout make noise voice neither shall word proceed mouth day bid shout shall ye shout 611 ark lord compassed city going came camp lodged camp 612 joshua rose early morning priests took ark lord 613 seven priests bearing seven trumpets rams horns ark lord went continually blew trumpets armed men went rereward came ark lord priests going blowing trumpets 614 second day compassed city returned camp six days 615 came pass seventh day rose early dawning day compassed city manner seven times day compassed city seven times 616 came pass seventh time priests blew trumpets joshua said unto people shout lord hath given city 617 city shall accursed even therein lord rahab harlot shall live house hid messengers sent 618 ye wise keep accursed thing lest ye make accursed ye take accursed thing make camp israel curse trouble 619 silver gold vessels brass iron consecrated unto lord shall come treasury lord 620 people shouted priests blew trumpets came pass people heard sound trumpet people shouted great shout wall fell flat people went city every man straight took city 621 utterly destroyed city man woman young old ox sheep ass edge sword 622 joshua said unto two men spied country go harlots house bring thence woman hath ye sware unto 623 young men spies went brought rahab father mother brethren brought kindred left without camp israel 624 burnt city fire therein silver gold vessels brass iron put treasury house lord 625 joshua saved rahab harlot alive fathers household dwelleth israel even unto day hid messengers joshua sent spy jericho 626 joshua adjured time saying cursed man lord riseth buildeth city jericho shall lay foundation thereof firstborn youngest son shall set gates 627 lord joshua rent clothes fell earth upon face ark lord eventide elders israel put dust upon heads 77 joshua said alas lord god wherefore hast thou brought people jordan deliver us hand amorites destroy us would god content dwelt side jordan 78 lord shall say israel turneth backs enemies 79 canaanites inhabitants land shall hear shall environ us round cut name earth wilt thou unto thy great name 710 lord said unto joshua get thee wherefore liest thou thus upon thy face 711 israel hath sinned also transgressed covenant commanded even taken accursed thing also stolen dissembled also put even among stuff 712 therefore children israel could stand enemies turned backs enemies accursed neither except ye destroy accursed among 713 sanctify people say sanctify morrow thus saith lord god israel accursed thing midst thee israel thou canst stand thine enemies ye take away accursed thing among 714 morning therefore ye shall brought according tribes shall tribe lord taketh shall come according families thereof family lord shall take shall come households household lord shall take shall come man man 715 shall taken accursed thing shall burnt fire hath hath transgressed covenant lord hath wrought folly israel people city land 82 thou shalt ai king thou didst unto jericho king spoil thereof cattle thereof shall ye take prey unto lay thee ambush city behind 83 joshua arose people war go ai joshua chose woman sustain thee 1710 arose went zarephath came gate city behold widow woman gathering sticks called said fetch pray thee little water vessel may drink 1711 going fetch called said bring pray thee morsel bread thine hand 1712 said lord thy god liveth cake handful meal barrel little oil cruse behold gathering two sticks may go dress son may eat die 1713 elijah said unto fear go thou hast said make thereof little cake first bring unto make thee thy son 1714 thus saith lord god israel barrel meal shall waste neither shall cruse oil fail day lord sendeth rain upon earth 1715 went according saying elijah house eat many days 1716 barrel meal wasted neither cruse oil fail according word lord spake elijah 1717 came pass things son woman mistress house fell sick sickness sore breath left 1718 said unto elijah thee thou man god art thou come unto call sin remembrance slay son 1719 said unto give thy son took bosom carried loft abode laid upon bed 1720 cried unto lord said lord god hast thou also brought evil upon widow sojourn slaying son 1721 stretched upon child three times cried unto lord said lord god pray thee let childs soul come 1722 lord heard voice elijah soul child came revived 1723 elijah took child brought chamber house delivered unto mother elijah said see thy son liveth 1724 woman said elijah know thou art man god word lord thy mouth truth 181 came pass many days thither syrians come 610 king israel sent place man god told warned saved twice 611 therefore heart king syria sore troubled thing called servants said unto ye shew us king israel 612 one servants said none lord king elisha prophet israel telleth king israel words thou speakest thy bedchamber 613 said go spy may send fetch told saying behold dothan 614 therefore sent thither horses chariots midst samaria 621 king israel said unto elisha saw father shall smite shall smite 622 answered thou shalt smite wouldest thou smite thou hast taken captive thy sword thy bow set bread water may eat drink go master 623 prepared great provision eaten drunk sent away went master bands syria came land israel 624 came pass benhadad king syria gathered host went besieged samaria 625 great famine samaria behold besieged asss head sold fourscore pieces silver fourth part cab doves dung five pieces silver 626 king israel passing upon wall cried woman unto saying help lord king 627 said lord help thee whence shall help thee barnfloor winepress 628 king said unto aileth thee answered woman said unto give thy son may eat day eat son morrow 629 boiled son eat said unto next day give thy son may eat hath hid son 630 came pass king heard words woman rent clothes passed upon wall people looked behold sackcloth within upon flesh 631 said god also head elisha son shaphat shall stand day 632 elisha sat house elders sat king sent man ere messenger came said elders see ye son murderer hath sent take away mine head look messenger cometh shut door hold fast door sound masters feet behind 633 yet talked behold messenger came unto said behold evil lord wait lord longer 71 elisha said hear ye word lord thus saith lord morrow time shall measure fine flour sold shekel two measures barley shekel gate samaria 72 lord whose hand king leaned answered man god said behold lord would make windows heaven might thing said behold thou shalt see thine eyes shalt eat thereof 73 four leprous men entering gate said one another sit die 74 say enter city famine city shall die sit still die also therefore come let us fall unto host syrians save us alive shall live kill us shall die 75 rose twilight go unto camp syrians come uttermost part camp syria behold man 76 lord made host syrians hear noise chariots noise horses even noise great host said one another lo king israel hath hired us kings hittites kings egyptians come upon us 77 wherefore arose fled twilight left tents horses asses even camp fled life 78 lepers came uttermost part camp went one tent eat drink carried thence silver gold raiment went hid came entered another tent carried thence also went hid 79 said one another well day day good tidings hold peace tarry till morning light mischief come upon us therefore come may go tell kings household 710 came called unto porter city told saying came camp syrians behold man neither voice man horses tied asses tied tents 711 called porters told kings house within 712 king arose night said unto servants shew syrians done us know hungry therefore gone camp hide field saying come city shall catch alive get city 713 one servants answered said let take pray thee five horses remain left city behold multitude israel left behold say even multitude israelites consumed let us send see 714 took therefore two chariot horses king sent host syrians saying go see 715 went unto jordan lo way full garments vessels syrians cast away haste messengers returned told king 716 people went spoiled tents syrians measure fine flour sold shekel two measures barley shekel according word lord 717 king appointed lord whose hand leaned charge gate people trode upon gate died man god said spake king came 718 came pass man god spoken king saying two measures barley shekel measure fine flour shekel shall morrow time gate samaria 719 lord answered man god said behold lord make windows heaven might thing said behold thou shalt see thine eyes shalt eat thereof 720 fell unto people trode upon gate died 81 spake elisha unto woman whose son restored life saying arise go thou thine household sojourn wheresoever thou canst sojourn lord hath called famine shall also come upon land day night 410 judah said strength bearers burdens decayed much rubbish able build wall 411 adversaries said shall know neither see till come midst among slay cause work cease 412 came pass jews dwelt came said unto us ten times places whence ye shall return unto us upon 413 therefore set lower places behind wall higher places even set people families swords spears bows 414 looked rose said unto nobles rulers rest people ye afraid remember lord great terrible fight brethren sons daughters wives houses 415 came pass enemies heard known unto us god brought counsel nought returned us wall every one unto work 416 came pass time forth half servants wrought work half held spears shields bows habergeons rulers behind house judah 417 builded wall bare burdens laded every one one hands wrought work hand held weapon 418 builders every one sword girded side builded sounded trumpet 419 said unto nobles rulers rest people work great large separated upon wall one far another 420 place therefore ye hear sound trumpet resort ye thither unto us god shall fight us 421 laboured work half held spears rising morning till stars appeared 422 likewise time said unto people let every one servant lodge within jerusalem night may guard us labour day 423 neither brethren servants men guard followed none us put clothes saving every one put washing 51 great cry people wives brethren jews 52 said sons daughters many therefore take corn may eat live 53 also said mortgaged lands vineyards houses might buy corn dearth 54 also said borrowed money kings tribute upon lands vineyards 55 yet flesh flesh brethren children children lo bring bondage sons daughters servants daughters brought unto bondage already neither power redeem men lands vineyards 56 angry heard cry words 57 consulted rebuked nobles rulers said unto ye exact usury every one brother set great assembly 58 said unto ability redeemed brethren jews sold unto heathen ye even sell brethren shall sold unto us held peace found nothing fear god 516 yea also continued work wall neither bought land servants gathered thither unto work 517 moreover table hundred fifty jews rulers beside came unto us among heathen us 518 prepared daily mischief 63 sent messengers unto saying great work come work cease whilst leave come 64 yet sent unto four times sort answered manner 65 sent sanballat servant unto like manner fifth time open letter hand 66 wherein written reported among heathen gashmu saith thou jews think rebel cause thou buildest wall thou mayest king according words 67 thou hast also appointed prophets preach thee jerusalem name exalted blessing praise 96 thou even thou art lord alone thou hast made heaven heaven heavens host earth things therein seas therein thou preservest host heaven worshippeth thee 97 thou art lord god didst choose abram broughtest forth ur chaldees gavest name abraham 98 foundest heart faithful thee madest covenant give land canaanites hittites amorites perizzites jebusites girgashites give say seed hast performed thy words thou art righteous 99 didst see affliction fathers egypt heardest cry red sea 910 shewedst signs wonders upon pharaoh servants people land thou knewest dealt proudly didst thou get thee name day 911 thou didst divide sea went midst sea dry land persecutors thou threwest deeps stone mighty waters 912 moreover thou leddest day cloudy pillar night pillar fire give light way wherein go 913 thou camest also upon mount sinai spakest heaven gavest right judgments true laws good statutes commandments 914 madest known unto thy holy sabbath commandedst precepts statutes laws hand moses thy servant 915 gavest bread heaven hunger broughtest forth water rock thirst promisedst go possess land thou hadst sworn give 916 fathers dealt proudly hardened necks hearkened thy commandments 917 refused obey neither mindful thy wonders thou didst among hardened necks rebellion appointed captain return bondage thou art god ready pardon gracious merciful slow anger great kindness forsookest 918 yea made molten calf said thy god brought thee egypt wrought great provocations 919 yet thou thy manifold mercies forsookest wilderness pillar cloud departed day lead way neither pillar fire night shew light way wherein go 920 thou gavest also thy good spirit instruct withheldest thy manna mouth gavest water thirst 921 yea forty years didst thou sustain wilderness lacked nothing clothes waxed old feet swelled 922 moreover thou gavest kingdoms nations didst divide corners possessed land sihon land king heshbon land og king bashan 923 children also multipliedst thou stars heaven broughtest land concerning thou hadst promised fathers go possess 924 children went possessed land thou subduedst inhabitants land canaanites gavest hands kings people land might would 925 took strong cities fat land possessed houses full goods wells digged vineyards oliveyards fruit trees abundance eat filled became fat delighted thy great goodness 926 nevertheless disobedient rebelled thee cast thy law behind backs slew thy prophets testified turn thee wrought great provocations 927 therefore thou deliveredst hand enemies vexed time trouble cried unto thee thou heardest heaven according thy manifold mercies thou gavest saviours saved hand enemies 928 rest evil thee therefore leftest thou land enemies dominion yet returned cried unto thee thou heardest heaven many times didst thou deliver according thy mercies 929 testifiedst thou mightest bring unto thy law yet dealt proudly hearkened unto thy commandments sinned thy judgments man shall live withdrew shoulder hardened neck would hear 930 yet many years didst thou forbear testifiedst thy spirit thy prophets yet would give ear therefore gavest thou hand people lands 931 nevertheless thy great mercies sake thou didst utterly consume forsake thou art gracious merciful god 932 therefore god great mighty terrible god keepest covenant mercy let trouble seem little thee hath come upon us kings princes priests prophets fathers thy people since time kings assyria unto day 933 howbeit thou art brought upon us thou hast done right done wickedly 934 neither kings princes priests fathers kept thy law hearkened unto thy commandments thy testimonies wherewith thou didst testify 935 served thee kingdom thy great goodness thou gavest large fat land thou gavest neither turned wicked works 936 haman sat drink city shushan perplexed 41 mordecai perceived done mordecai rent clothes put sackcloth ashes went midst city cried loud bitter cry 42 came even kings gate none might enter kings gate clothed sackcloth 43 every province whithersoever kings commandment decree came great mourning among jews fasting weeping wailing many lay sackcloth ashes 44 esthers maids chamberlains came told queen exceedingly grieved sent raiment clothe mordecai take away sackcloth received 45 called esther hatach one kings chamberlains appointed attend upon gave commandment mordecai know 46 hatach went forth mordecai unto street city kings gate 47 mordecai told happened unto sum money haman promised pay kings treasuries jews destroy 48 also gave copy writing decree given shushan destroy shew unto esther declare unto charge go unto king make supplication unto make request people 49 hatach came told esther words mordecai 410 esther spake unto hatach gave commandment unto mordecai 411 kings servants people kings provinces know whosoever whether man woman shall come unto king inner court called one law put death except king shall hold golden sceptre may live called come unto king thirty days 412 told mordecai esthers words 413 mordecai commanded answer esther think thyself thou shalt escape kings house jews 414 thou altogether holdest thy peace time shall enlargement deliverance arise jews another place thou thy fathers house shall destroyed knoweth whether thou art come kingdom time 415 esther bade return mordecai answer 416 go gather together jews present shushan fast ye neither eat beauty man may remain house 4414 heweth cedars taketh cypress oak strengtheneth among trees forest planteth ash rain doth nourish 4415 shall man burn take thereof warm yea kindleth baketh bread yea pacified toward thee thou hast done saith lord god 171 word lord came unto saying 172 son man put forth riddle speak parable unto house israel 173 say thus saith lord god great eagle great wings placed great waters set willow tree 176 grew became spreading vine low stature whose branches turned toward roots thereof became vine brought forth branches shot forth sprigs 177 also another great might goodly vine 179 say thou thus saith lord god shall prosper shall pull roots thereof cut fruit thereof wither shall wither leaves spring even without great power many people pluck roots thereof 1710 yea behold planted shall prosper shall utterly wither east wind toucheth shall wither furrows grew 1711 moreover word lord came unto saying 1712 say rebellious house know ye things mean tell behold king babylon come jerusalem hath taken king thereof princes thereof led babylon 1713 hath taken kings seed made covenant hath taken oath hath also taken mighty land 1714 kingdom might base might lift keeping covenant might stand 1715 rebelled sending ambassadors egypt might give horses much people shall prosper shall escape doeth things shall break covenant delivered 1716 live saith lord god surely place king dwelleth made king whose oath despised whose covenant brake even midst babylon shall die 1717 neither shall pharaoh mighty army great company make war casting mounts building forts cut many persons 1718 seeing despised oath breaking covenant lo given hand hath done things shall escape 1719 therefore thus saith lord god live surely mine oath hath despised covenant speaketh lord hosts saying people say time come time lords house built 13 came word lord haggai prophet saying 14 time ye dwell cieled houses house lie waste 15 therefore thus saith lord hosts consider ways 16 ye sown much bring little ye eat ye enough ye drink ye filled drink ye clothe none warm earneth wages earneth wages put bag holes 17 thus saith lord hosts consider ways 18 go mountain bring wood build house take pleasure glorified saith lord 19 ye looked much lo came little ye brought home blow upon saith lord hosts mine house waste ye run every man unto house 110 therefore heaven stayed dew earth stayed fruit 111 called drought upon land upon mountains upon corn upon new wine upon oil upon ground bringeth forth upon men upon cattle upon labour hands 112 zerubbabel son shealtiel joshua son josedech high priest remnant people obeyed voice lord god words haggai prophet lord god sent people fear lord 113 spake haggai lords messenger lords message unto people saying saith lord 114 lord stirred spirit zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah spirit joshua son josedech high priest spirit remnant people came work house lord hosts god 115 four twentieth day sixth month second year darius king 21 seventh month one twentieth day month came word lord prophet haggai saying 22 speak zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah joshua son josedech high priest residue let us go unto 1116 said thomas called didymus unto fellow disciples let us also go may die 1117 jesus came found lain grave four days already 1118 bethany nigh unto jerusalem fifteen furlongs 1119 many jews came martha mary comfort concerning brother 1120 martha soon heard jesus coming went met mary sat still house 1121 said martha unto jesus lord thou hadst brother died 1122 know even whatsoever thou wilt ask god god give thee 1123 jesus saith unto thy brother shall rise 1124 martha saith unto know shall rise resurrection last day 1125 jesus said unto resurrection life believeth though dead yet shall live 1126 whosoever liveth believeth shall never die believest thou 1127 saith unto yea lord believe thou art christ son god come world 1128 said went way called mary sister secretly saying master come calleth thee 1129 soon heard arose quickly came unto 1130 jesus yet come town place martha met 1131 jews house comforted saw mary rose hastily went followed saying goeth unto grave weep 1132 mary come jesus saw fell feet saying unto lord thou hadst brother died 1133 jesus therefore saw weeping jews also weeping came groaned spirit troubled 1134 said ye laid said unto lord come see 1135 jesus wept 1136 said jews behold loved 1137 said could man opened eyes blind caused even man died 1138 jesus therefore groaning cometh grave cave stone lay upon 1139 jesus said take ye away stone martha sister dead saith unto lord time stinketh hath dead four days 1140 jesus saith unto said unto thee thou wouldest believe thou shouldest see glory god 1141 took away stone place dead laid jesus lifted eyes said father thank thee thou hast heard 1142 knew thou hearest always people stand said may believe thou hast sent 1143 thus spoken cried loud voice lazarus come forth 1144 awaking sleep seeing prison doors open drew sword would killed supposing prisoners fled 1628 paul cried loud voice saying thyself harm 1629 called light sprang came trembling fell paul silas 1630
